name: Valet Parking !
description:
Brand New Game from Producers of City Driving and Truck Simulator 2017.

Parking your customers cars safely, be the best valet driver! Multi Level Car Parking Game.
Completely realistic missions and Car Parking experience are waiting for you.

FEATURES

- Multi Level Car Parking
- Realistic customers
- 360° camera
- Detailed environment
- More than 50+ career levels
- Amazing real-like graphics
- Realistic traffic system
- Achievements and Leaderboards
- Easy controls (Tilt, Buttons or steering wheel)
- More than 15 language support


GAMEPLAY

- Control your vehicle by motion sensor or touching
- Touch right on screen to accelerate
- Touch left on screen to slow down
- You may change vehicle controls through settings


HINTS

- Do not crash to earn more money
- If you car drive faster, you can get more money and points
- You can get more money and points by overtaking a vehicle in traffic


Attention: Drive safely and follow traffic rules in real life.


For any inquires and opinions please contact us on help@zuuks.com.
